visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type is 'column', chart title is 'Monthly Sales Data', axes and labels styling includes blue color for labels, 14px font size for axis titles, and bold font for chart title, data series includes two series with the provided data, custom colors are ['#7cb5ec', '#434348'], and additional configurations include a white background, legend enabled, and chart margins set to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with the specified settings. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'Monthly Sales Data' with bold styling. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a blue color and 14px font size, and the y-axis title is also styled similarly. The chart includes two data series, each with its own set of monthly sales data and a custom color from the provided list. The chart has a white background and margins of 50 pixels on all sides. The legend is enabled to display the series names. The column plot options include stacking, point padding, and group padding settings to ensure the columns are stacked and properly spaced.
